name: SUMO-NAMI
description:
Smash the ground to defeat enemies, then eat them! Gain weight, then face the Sumo King! Jump on his head to beat him!

This game was completed in 48 hours and submitted to the 2017 Global Game Jam. Original link: https://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/sumo-nami-0

Controls:

W - Move forward

A/D - Turn

Space - Jump

Credits:

Chris Carmichael
